LABEL: 0x3E2
STRING: ――I have a terrible headache.

LABEL: 0x404
STRING: Even though I know the sensation of my brain being churned is virtual, it doesn't transmit into my body and disappear.

LABEL: 0x46E
STRING: Then, "she" in front of me asks...

LABEL: 0x49A
STRING: 「How was it?」

LABEL: 0x4B6
STRING: The tragedy is repeating itself again.

LABEL: 0x4DE
STRING: As I watch the events unfold before me,

LABEL: 0x510
STRING: I feel powerless to stop them.

LABEL: 0x542
STRING: 「Why――」

LABEL: 0x560
STRING: 「Why did she die?」

LABEL: 0x590
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5AC
STRING: Her name, her face, comes back to me from the depths of my memory.

LABEL: 0x5E0
STRING: I know who she is.

LABEL: 0x60C
STRING: ...No, I knew.

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: After all, she was now――

LABEL: 0x650
STRING: 「It was your choice, Hitoha-san.」

LABEL: 0x680
STRING: You're wrong.

LABEL: 0x694
STRING: The one who chose... was "him."

LABEL: 0x6BA
STRING: The man simulated in my memories made the choice...

LABEL: 0x6FE
STRING: 「Choices are painful things.」

LABEL: 0x724
STRING: "She's" right.

LABEL: 0x748
STRING: The pain that comes with making a choice――

LABEL: 0x7E8
STRING: 「...I want to run away.」

LABEL: 0x806
STRING: I can't help but say it out loud.

LABEL: 0x834
STRING: This is only a simulation, yet it's so painful.

LABEL: 0x87E
STRING: I can't stand it.

LABEL: 0x89A
STRING: I don't want to endure this.

LABEL: 0x8B6
STRING: I want to throw everything away and run.

LABEL: 0x8E4
STRING: 「Have you heard about this story of a death row inmate?」

LABEL: 0x91C
STRING: 「At the time of their execution, the convict has a rope put around their neck and is forced to stand on a floor with a square cut out for them.」

LABEL: 0x97C
STRING: 「After which someone presses a button, opening the abyss beneath their feet and making the convict fall――」

LABEL: 0x9C8
STRING: 「――Ending their life.」

LABEL: 0x9EE
STRING: It sounds heartless.

LABEL: 0xA06
STRING: Just imagining it makes it feel all the more real and vivid.

LABEL: 0xA58
STRING: ――Inside the simulation, death is ever close by.

LABEL: 0xAF5
STRING: 「So, here's the story. There were actually more than one of these "buttons."」

LABEL: 0xB55
STRING: 「More than one?」

LABEL: 0xB6D
STRING: 「Yes. There were several people gathered in that room, all with their hands on a button in front of them.」

LABEL: 0xBC7
STRING: 「Then, they all press them at the same time as ordered.」

LABEL: 0xBF9
STRING: 「However, only one of the buttons actually opens the hatch.」

LABEL: 0xC45
STRING: 「So, what would you say was the point of all that?」

LABEL: 0xC83
STRING: That question――

LABEL: 0xC9F
STRING: Technically, it was a question posed to me.

LABEL: 0xCCB
STRING: In reality, however, "she" already had an answer ready.

LABEL: 0xD0B
STRING: 「...Why? What was the point?」

LABEL: 0xD31
STRING: "She" answers.

LABEL: 0xD51
STRING: 「――To make causality into a black box.」

LABEL: 0xD8B
STRING: 「Choices always come with responsibility.」

LABEL: 0xDB7
STRING: 「"If I hadn't pressed that button, they wouldn't have died." A strong fear like that.」

LABEL: 0xE1F
STRING: 「The awareness that their own choice is what killed them...」

LABEL: 0xE59
STRING: 「Having multiple buttons lightens that mental burden. In other words...」

LABEL: 0xEA3
STRING: 「――"My button might not have connected to the abyss."」

LABEL: 0xEEF
STRING: 「Whether they pressed the button or not, the convict must've been killed by the real button pushed by someone else.」

LABEL: 0xF5B
STRING: 「The existence of that possibility is what saves them.」

LABEL: 0xF89
STRING: "She" continues.

LABEL: 0xFB1
STRING: 「While it's possible that the button they pressed wasn't the one that killed them...」

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: 「...At the same time, you can't deny the possibility that they took the convict's life.」

LABEL: 0x109B
STRING: 「What do you think?」

LABEL: 0x10C7
STRING: The voice is aimed straight at me.

LABEL: 0x10F7
STRING: But... I'm unable to look directly at "her" face.

LABEL: 0x1133
STRING: 「I think you understand that it's just a fabrication.」

LABEL: 0x117B
STRING: 「You're smart.」

LABEL: 0x11A1
STRING: 「So, such escapism will never help you heal.」

LABEL: 0x11E7
STRING: Even if it's all a fabrication...

LABEL: 0x120B
STRING: ...Still, if I say I want salvation, would "she" forgive me?

LABEL: 0x125D
STRING: "She" might.

LABEL: 0x1285
STRING: But would "I" be able to forgive myself?

LABEL: 0x1343
STRING: 「Are you all right, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x136B
STRING: Something flickers in my head, along with a stabbing headache.

LABEL: 0x13A7
STRING: 「The strain on you must be terrible... All these trips back and forth in such a short period of time.」

LABEL: 0x13F9
STRING: 「There are only a few more left.」

LABEL: 0x1419
STRING: 「...Shall we go back, then?」

LABEL: 0x1443
STRING: My hesitation hasn't disappeared.

LABEL: 0x146B
STRING: However, I almost reflexively nod my head.

LABEL: 0x1495
STRING: My vision and my senses are being repainted.

LABEL: 0x14C1
STRING: Amidst the noise that carries me back to the past, "her" words spiral around in my head.

LABEL: 0x1511
STRING: I feel like I've heard that same question before.

LABEL: 0x15B1
STRING: 「If you reach the worst possible outcome while aiming for the best, what will you do?」

LABEL: 0x160F
STRING: I fall through "her" question, unable to find an answer.

LABEL: 0x1651
STRING: I fall.
